Title: Milagro
Plot: A writer living next to Mulder becomes obsessed with Scully and confesses to her that he is using her for a character in his novel. Scully finds herself strangely drawn to him even though he is now the prime suspect in the murder case that she and Mulder are investigating.
GuestStars: John Hawkes, Nestor Serrano, Michael Bailey Smith, Angelo Vacco, Jillian Bach, Casey C. O'Neill, D. Bennett Nelson, Michelle Chaldau
